desc: Canada's leading online archery retailer. Specializing in target, hunting, 3D and traditional Archery. Buy compound bows, recurve bows, arrows & equipment. Servicing hunters, recurve, compound and Olympic style archers. Top Brands such as Hoyt, Win & Win, Carbon Express, Easton, Beiter, Shibuya, Bohning and more!

layout.text: One of the most respected and sought after optic brands is now available at Canada Archery. With more of their lineup on the way.
